name: Quantify and Cluster Cell Motility
description: Quantify cell motility features from time-lapse microscopy images and cluster cells based on motility patterns. Tracks cells across time frames, calculates speed, directionality, and mean squared displacement, then performs k-means clustering to identify distinct motility patterns.

image_sequence_path.description: Path to directory containing time-lapse microscopy images in sequential order

num_clusters.description: Number of motility pattern clusters to identify

instructions: git clone https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/Biomni && cd /tmp/Biomni && pip install -e . && cd /Users/david/git/prod_apps/biomni/cell_biology && python quantify_and_cluster_cell_motility.py
